title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-5.3 - Medical criteria for disability determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-5.3 - Medical criteria for disability determination

State Regulations

The medical criteria to be used in determining
disability for MA eligibility is the same medical criteria set forth in Federal
regulations for determining disability for social security and SSI
purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-5.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
